Description:
Prison Architect - This is an indie game, and at the same time Strater, the essence of which - To build a prison
and manage it. You start with an empty plot of land on which you build a real prison with all the nuances, taking
into account all the features and expecting everything for the future.

Features:
Ã¢â„¢Â¦ Configure and manage the revenue jail.
Ã¢â„¢Â¦ Manage income and expenditure, choose the best options for spending your limited resources.
Ã¢â„¢Â¦ Make sure that the prisoners were happy, or they can arrange a riot.
Ã¢â„¢Â¦ Better surveillance cameras to high-risk prisoners.
Ã¢â„¢Â¦ Create new rooms with electric chairs for the execution of death sentences.
